ygData.subject: Time series framework

Hi,

I am in the midst of building a times series predicting framework
base=
d on Matt Buckland's windows c++ code.

I've removed the visualization aspe=
cts.

Made it compile under windows and Linux (the same code runs 250%
fast=
er under Linux BTW).

Made a generalized framework for loading time series =
patterns from a file.

It is quite rough and undocumented but it allows you=
 to simply edit a
parameter file and present patterns to do time-series pre=
diction using
NEAT. I think it is also quite fast and I have some plans tha=
t I will
elucidate on in my next message that could significantly speed it =
up.

I've also built a little tool to run the saved result network and
gene=
rate a CSV file. So you can load the times series as a graph in
excel and v=
isualize the results of your networks prediction compared
to the original t=
ime series.

It has plenty of work that needs done on it. But I figured I m=
ight
create a Sourceforge page and post it if anyone is interested?

Thanks=
,

Shane
